title: PSP FIELDS full cadence Fluxgate Magnetometer (MAG) data in SC coordinates - Stuart D. Bale (bale@berkeley.edu) (UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'epoch_mag_SC' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/psp/fields/l2/mag_sc/2018/psp_fld_l2_mag_sc_2018100200_v02.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 58.7296% of the 336342 timesteps. Cadence = 13653248 [ns] = PT0.013653S.
info.contact: Stuart D. Bale (bale@berkeley.edu) @ UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time in TT2000 for full cadence MAG waveform data

parameters.name: psp_fld_l2_mag_SC
parameters.description: Magnetic field in SC coordinates (full cadence)

bins.name: component_index_SC
bins.description: Numerical index for B components in SC coordinates
